text: Dosi, osʹ, budʹ laska ubyvayuchyy odyn odnoho, ta evicting deyakyy z vas z yikhnikh domivok, banding proty nykh sinfully ta maliciously. Rivni koly vony zdalysya, vy zazhadaly vykupu z nykh. Evicting yim buly zaboroneni dlya vas u pershu cherhu. Vy viryte v chastyni svyatoho pysannya ta disbelieve u chastyni? Shcho retribution dlya ts sered vas shcho povynni buty tsi, krim prynyzhennya u tse zhyttya, ta dalekyy hirshyy retribution na Dni Resurrection? BOH nikoly unaware budʹ shcho vy
